thread.title: Your Heart Isn't Ready For This Sweet Video of Madonna's Twins Singing
thread.title_full: Your Heart Isn't Ready For This Sweet Video of Madonna's Twins Singing

author: Monica Sisavat
title: Your Heart Isn't Ready For This Sweet Video of Madonna's Twins Singing
text:
Madonna Instagram Video of Twin Daughters Singing Feb. 2017 Your Heart Isn't Ready For This Sweet Video of Madonna's Twins Singing February 19, 2017 A post shared by Madonna (@madonna) on Feb 18, 2017 at 5:50pm PST 
A passion for music clearly runs in Madonna's family. On Saturday, the pop icon shared a sweet Instagram video of her newly adopted twin daughters, Estere and Stelle, performing "Twinkle, Twinkle, Little Star" in matching striped pajamas. Along with the clip, Madonna wrote, "A little night Music ,,ğŸŒŸâ­ï¸ğŸŒŸâ­ï¸ğŸŒŸâ­ï¸ğŸ˜‚ğŸ’˜ğŸŒ¸ğŸ™ğŸ»" Madonna announced on social media earlier this month that she had adopted the 4-year-old twin girls from Malawi. She is also mom to four kids, 20-year-old Lourdes and 16-year-old Rocco, whom she has from previous relationships, and 11-year-old David and Mercy, whom she also adopted from Malawi. Related:
